channel.title: Generator on Daniel Rivas
channel.description: Recent content in Generator on Daniel Rivas

item.title: gom
item.description: When working in a new project, back-end and front-end developers often go hand in hand; even more if the front-end of the application makes heavy use of the API that back-end developers take care of. For simple applications, this is often not a problem, as the front-end developers just wait for the API updates and modify their side of the application accordingly. sequence 1 For bigger applications, the usual worflow is to make sure to design a good API specification that both the back-end and front-end developers need to follow.
